title: Manipulative Ex-Girlfriend Is Pregnant & Says I’m the Father
description:
In today’s show, we’re talking with a mom at a loss what to do about her rebellious teen daughter, a young wife terrified her husband’s cancer will return, and a man who doesn’t know how to move forward after his cheating ex announce she’s pregnant and he’s the father.
  Teen daughter is hiding sexual photos & smoking weed. How can we trust her?
 I’m terrified that my husband’s cancer will return
 Manipulative ex-girlfriend is pregnant & says I’m the father
 Lyrics of the Day: "Billie Jean" - Michael Jackson
  Let us know what’s going on by leaving a voicemail at 844.693.3291 or visiting johndelony.com/show.
  Support Our Sponsors:
  BetterHelp

  Resources:
  Own Your Past, Change Your Future
